Description: --> Schecter Banshee-6 Extreme Electric Guitar (Black Cherry Burst) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. Schecter Banshee-6 Extreme is a double-cutaway shred machine that is ready to take you to the next level. Featuring a contoured mahogany body with a quilted maple top, the Banshee-6 Extreme delivers top shelf quality at a working musicians price. The bolt-on neck is constructed from maple, while a rosewood fingerboard is equipped with 24 extra-jumbo frets that will facilitate effortless string bending. Pearloid & Abalone Vector inlays complete the shredder vibe of this guitar.The Banshee-6 Extreme sports a pair of high output Schecter Diamond Single Coil pickups in the neck and middle positions. A powerful Schecter Diamond Plus humbucker in the bridge position will deliver scorching shredder tones. The control panel includes master volume controls and tone control with push/pull coil tapping for the bridge pickup and a 5-way pickup selector switch, giving you endless tonal possibilities.Rounding out the sleek, black chrome hardware is a set of Schecter tuners . At the other end, the Banshee-6 Extreme is outfitted with a Schecter Custom Hardtail bridge with a String Thru Body design that will help keep your tuning and withstand anything you can dish out.
